title: EA Returns to Steam - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.29.19
description:
Right now, go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box.

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Greg Miller returns to Kinda Funny, and Imran and him tackle EA coming back to Steam.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:58 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is Saturday 11/2! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
But before that! Halloween Hellscape Thursday, on Halloween at 4PM. Youtube premiere on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:05:43 - EA Returns to Steam
00:13:05 - “EA just announced that they are returning to Steam and I can't help but wonder why…” - Fendyy
00:15:56 - Upgrade your Xbox One X to a Project Scarlet
00:22:58 - Kotaku going to war with Owner
00:29:40 - Ghost Recon’s Mea Culpa
00:42:45 - Japanese Government Honors Miyamoto
00:44:24 - Out today
00:50:06 -  Escape the Invasion
00:52:19 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:53:29 - “Are these BlizzCon leaks intentional?” - Borzen00
00:55:11 - “Who do you think will win out this weekend at BlizzCon?” - BJ Bernardo
00:58:35 PlayStation Vue Shutting Down
01:01:50 - “How do you get so good at talking/keeping a clear tone/being upbeat while in performance mode?” - Alexis Camacho
01:04:14 - “Is the Kinda Funny Team safe from all the fires?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
01:06:11 - Squad Up: Ryan - PS4 - AceAbueg
01:07:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Whitta
